law.catch_line: Member approval of other asset dispositions.
law.text: A sale, lease, exchange, license, or other disposition of assets of a limited cooperative association, other than a disposition described in KRS 272A.15-010, requires approval of the associationâ€™s members under KRS 272A.15-030 and 272A.15-040 if the disposition leaves the association without significant continuing business activity.
law.history: Created 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 160, sec. 107, effective July 12, 2012.
